attributes.action: Halt plans by the OCR to abolish the Ancient History A-level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plans have been revealed to remove the A-level in Ancient History from schools in the UK. The periods covered by this course shaped and influenced the world we live in today, including our notion of Democracy itself. Study of such events can only benefit future generations. It must be protected, not forgotten.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Halt plans by the OCR to abolish the Ancient History A-level."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
